title: Coronavirus: Why hanging on to a ticket could save your favourite festival
description: Some independent festivals are worried refunding after virus cancellation could end their business.

title: Coronavirus doctor's diary: The patient who married hours before dying
description: Dr John Wright relates two love stories from the Covid wards of Bradford Royal Infirmary.

title: Coronavirus dreams: Why are people having lockdown nightmares?
description: Some people are reporting more intense dreams while in lockdown due to coronavirus.

title: Coronavirus: Somali diaspora sends home stories of woe
description: British-Somalis have been badly hit in both economic and human terms.

title: Afghanistan: The detention centre for teenage Taliban members
description: The Afghan detention centre houses some 300 boys under 18, of whom half are alleged to be militants.

title: Meghan and Harry: Will the real couple please stand up?
description: Our royal correspondent considers the latest moves by the Duke and Duchess of Sussex.

title: Liverpool v Atletico Madrid virus link an 'interesting hypothesis'
description: A government adviser says speculation over a possible link between coronavirus cases in Liverpool and the club's Champions League match with Atletico Madrid last month is an "interesting hypothesis".

title: Coronavirus: Are hospital cleaners forgotten heroes in this crisis?
description: Hygiene has never seemed more important. Here's how a woman who cleans wards in Chicago is being affected.

title: Coronavirus: Rush for haircuts in Denmark as lockdown eases
description: Hairdressers and a range of other small businesses have reopened in Denmark.

title: Idris Elba 'humbled to be alive' after coronavirus
description: The actor says he's got a new outlook on life after recovery – and it's inspired him to help.

title: Coronavirus: 'Low confidence' over arrival of PPE from Turkey
description: Some hospital trusts are already short of protective gowns, according to NHS Providers.

title: Coronavirus: Boris Johnson fears second peak from relaxing lockdown
description: Government sources say measures are likely to be modified rather than eased in three weeks.

title: Coronavirus: Virgin Atlantic will fold without aid, warns Branson
description: Sir Richard Branson says he is not asking for a handout, but a commercial loan to save the airline.

title: Coronavirus: Minute silence in memory of NHS staff
description: Britain looks set to pay tribute next Tuesday to those who have died on the front line.

title: 'Sickeners, torture and tears' - Tony Bellew's column on SAS training
description: Former world cruiserweight champion Tony Bellew opens up about a challenging stint on TV show 'SAS Who Dares Wins Celebrity'.

description: Chris Sutton has billed Norwich City as the best team to be bottom of the Premier League - who else can compete for the title?

title: Coronavirus: Witney nurse, 84, 'gave her life to NHS'
description: Margaret Tapley, who was still working in a community hospital, died after contracting coronavirus.

title: Coronavirus: Stars take part in BBC lockdown learning scheme
description: Sir David Attenborough, Danny Dyer, Jodie Whittaker and Brian Cox are among celebrities involved,

title: Canada shooting: Gunman kills at least 16 in Nova Scotia
description: An attacker dressed as a policeman kills at least 16 in one of the country's worst mass shootings.

title: Coronavirus: Here's how you can stop bad information from going viral
description: Experts are calling on the public to practise ‘information hygiene’ to help stop the spread of falsehoods online.

title: World Rugby investigates Fiji chairman over homophobia allegations
description: World Rugby begins an investigation into the chairman of the Fiji Rugby Union, which has backed Sir Bill Beaumont's bid for re-election as boss of the world game.

title: Coronavirus: Protecting the 'one in a million' girl
description: Bex Price's family went into isolation early as coronavirus would almost certainly kill her.

title: 'I want the boys at the top' - Joshua eyes up Fury, Whyte & Usyk
description: Anthony Joshua targets Tyson Fury, Dillian Whyte and Oleksandr Usyk, plus Eddie Hearn planning big fights for boxing's return.

title: Coronavirus: Millions to claim as UK furlough scheme goes live
description: The Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme will cover 80% of workers' monthly wages up to £2,500.

title: BBC Sport's five things to do today
description: Our team give you something to read, watch, try, listen and take - all in one place.

title: Coronavirus: Damien Hirst’s rainbow giveaway
description: The artist is hoping to raise funds and spread joy with his latest artworks, created in response to the coronavirus crisis.

title: The times teams were denied glory by unexpected events
description: It remains possible that Liverpool's record-breaking season may not end with them being confirmed as champions. We look at times when teams were denied their crowning glory.

title: The Papers: 'Betrayal of our bravest' as PPE order delayed
description: Monday's papers report medics are "on the brink" of running out of vital kit as a shipment is grounded.

title: Coronavirus journey: The 'last cruise ship on Earth' finally comes home
description: From political storms to presidential pleas, it has been quite a journey for the MSC Magnifica.

title: Prince Harry and Meghan tell tabloids: No more co-operation
description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex say popular newspapers are publishing "salacious gossip" for clicks.

title: Coronavirus: Plasma treatment to be trialled
description: The hope is blood from coronavirus survivors could treat hospital patients ill with Covid-19.

description: Many parents are now responsible for their children's education, but as social media evidence suggests, it's not easy.

title: Coronavirus: 'I'm the nurse who switches off the ventilator'
description: Medical teams face tough decisions about when to turn off breathing machines for Covid-19 patients. One nurse tells her story.
